text: Bristol Rugby are a rugby club based in Bristol, England who play in the RFU Championship. Their greatest success was winning the John Player Cup in 1983, which was at the time the sole national competition in English rugby. ==League position== Season League Position 2010/11 RFU Championship 8th 2011/12 RFU Championship 1st 2012/13 RFU Championship 5th ===Former position=== Category:English rugby union teams Category:Organisations based in Bristol
title: Bristol Rugby
